message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is truly invaluable. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you might be $1000000. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to you to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950000. This offer allows me to earn a substantial return on my investment, while you receive a product that far exceeds its cost. I look forward to discussing the details further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies us both.
